snippet: One protester was shot and killed and another seriously wounded in southern Thailand at the site of a blockade by farmers protesting a fall in rubber prices.
abstract: Protester is shot and killed and another seriously wounded in southern Thailand at site of blockade by rubber farmers who are protesting a sharp fall in rubber prices; episode adds further volatility to protests that began in early August 2013 and have support of country's Democratic Party, which leads opposition in Parliament.
lead_paragraph: One protester was shot and killed and another seriously wounded in southern Thailand at the site of a blockade by farmers protesting a fall in rubber prices.
